articles.title: Egypt court jails belly-dancer for 'debauchery' in TikTok video in social media crackdown - Mirror Online
articles.description: Egyptian belly-dancer Sama el-Masry has been jailed for three years and fined £15,000 after a court ruled she incited "debauchery" and "immorality" in a TikTok video
articles.content:
An Egyptian belly-dancer has been jailed for three years after a court ruled she incited "debauchery" in a TikTok video.
